name: Arc'teryx Acrux TR Gore-Tex Hiking Boots - Men's
description: Take on multiday excursions in technical terrain with comfortable and protected feet. The Acrux TR is made with a lightweight and highly wear-resistant upper, thanks to its integrated micro-plates - a material commonly used in bomb-disposal suits. The TPU overlay and rubber toecap protect high abrasion areas and an integrated TPU chassis keeps your feet stable and supported on uneven terrain.SuperFabric® upper is infused with tiny guard plates for durability and abrasion resistance.Waterproof-breathable GORE-TEX® membrane shelter feet from the elements.Durable TPU film overlay and rubber toecap resist abrasion and protect feet from trail bumps.3D moulded Ortholite™ footbed delivers maximum comfort, breathability and arch support.Injected EVA midsole cushions underfoot.Integrated TPU chassis adds stability and torsional rigidity on technical trails.Vibram® MegaGrip™ rubber outsole provides confident footing in varied terrain.
